Plastic bags

Less than 1 percent of plastic bags goes into a recycle bin.

Billions of plastic bags are made each year. 100 billion are thrown away according to Worldwatch Institute, with less than 1% ending into a recycle bin.

Posted 1. May 2018. 1 min read.
# learning # plastic # plastic-alternatives # save-oceans # social-responsibility # recycle
